summary: Amendment No. 1 to the Securities Purchase Agreement, dated November 17, 2025, modifies the original agreement between Inflection Point Acquisition Corp. IV, Merlin Labs, Inc., and the Purchaser to double the shares of Preferred Stock and Warrant Shares to be purchased for $100,000,000. It also introduces new terms regarding the roles and liabilities of the Placement Agents involved in the transaction. The amendment incorporates specific sections from the original agreement and includes a revised Schedule A and Exhibit A.

content.text: Does this private placement exemption comply with Regulation D safe harbor requirements? Analyze using 2021 SEC guidance and relevant case precedents.
